meanings.definition: Participating in a religious ceremony with other priests.
meanings.sent1: During the concelebrating, the priests stood together in unity.
meanings.sent2: The concelebrating of the Mass brought a sense of community among the clergy.
meanings.sent3: The concelebrating priests shared a moment of reverence and camaraderie.
meanings.sent4: In the act of concelebrating, the priests symbolized harmony and togetherness.
meanings.sent5: The atmosphere during the concelebrating was filled with solemnity and respect.

meanings.definition: To jointly celebrate a religious service with other priests.
meanings.sent1: The priests will be concelebrating the special Mass next Sunday.
meanings.sent2: They are concelebrating the Eucharist to honor a significant occasion.
meanings.sent3: Concelebrating together, the priests added a sense of grandeur to the service.
meanings.sent4: The act of concelebrating showcases the unity and bond among the clergy.
meanings.sent5: The priests will be concelebrating joyfully, sharing the sacred moment.
